item.title: Don't pay to meditate
item.description: The other day, my Twitter feed informed me Penn Jillette just clocked in 1000 consecutive days of meditation using the Headspace app. Now he’s considering checking out Sam Harris’s new Waking Up meditation app. Sam left a congratulatory comment on Penn’s tweet. Well done, Penn! https://t.co/SZkKocIPEH — Sam Harris (@SamHarrisOrg) October 7, 2018 The whole thing was rainbows and kittens. And it reminded me to pass on some advice: Stop using fee-based meditation apps!
